compliant.section: 簡介 – 本公司致力採取合理措施，以確保您的個人資料之正確性與即時性。當我們發現您的個人資料有錯誤時，我們會即時更正錯誤之資訊，或加以刪除。
compliant.legal provisions:
Data accuracy principle: Personal data shall be accurate and, where necessary, kept up to date; every reasonable step must be taken to ensure that personal data that are inaccurate, having regard to the purposes for which they are processed, are erased or rectified without delay.

Right to rectification: The data subject shall have the right to obtain from the controller without undue delay the rectification of inaccurate personal data concerning him or her.
